title: What are the ethnic differences between Javanese and Balinese people? - Quora

response.answer_text: The most notable differences between both ethnic groups are their religions and languages. Javanese are mostly Muslims (although there’s also some Christian and Hindu minority within Javanese ethnicity) while most Balinese are Hindu. The other one is their languages. As you can guess, Javanese speak Javanese while Balinese speak Balinese. However, I still have to tell you that both languages are not mutually intelligible.
